column5: The Phnom Penh Police Commissionerâ€™s Office of Immigration Investigation and Procedure received one Chinese man
column7: from the Anti-Narcotics Bureau of the Police Phnom Penh police.------The man does not have a valid passport/visa and has been using illicit drugs.------He arrived Cambodia in August 2019 by the Phnom Penh International Airport as a tourist.------He was referred to the Department of Investigation and Implementation of the Directorate General of Immigration to carry legal procedures.------Source: Phnom Penh Police
